Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class IslandTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.IslandTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class IslandTile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents the single Islands in the game, with methods that can control their state and handle the conquest of an island after the movement of mother nature. The influence calculator has been handled with a state pattern
Author:
Lorenzo Corrado

    • conquer

      public void conquer(ArrayList<Player> players)
      Check the influence for every player on the island, then proceed to change the color of the towers with the color of the player's tower with the maximum influence. The add and removal of the tower from the board to the island is handled by the method
      Parameters:
      players - The players in Game
